Text:
Thanks for the ul, LeonarTSpock!

Any chance of the ROOK series being reseeded?

Or Richard Corben's DEN being ul?

Nice to see you back!  ;-)

Thanks bg, and you're most welcome. Good to be back.

Den, absolutely yes. That was always my plan, but I can't locate a complete version of NeverWhere (the first volume). Short of that I'm ready to go.

The Rook I don't have, but I'll put it on the search list.

LeonardTSpock, here's the complete run of 1984 and 1994:
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8399649

LeonardTSpock, is this the series you're looking for?
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8400427

No BC, but thank you for posting it, because somebody had asked me for it a while back and I totally spaced it!

I was looking for the first volume of Den, which is called NeverWhere. Or rather, I was looking for a complete version, as one after another of the files I was finding were only half the book. I finally found it this afternoon, though.
